A

addItem(I, GregorianCalendar, int) - Method in class Inventory
Adds an item to the inventory with the specified expiration date and quantity.

C

compareTo(FoodItem) - Method in class FoodItem
Compares this FoodItem to another FoodItem to determine relative order (for sorting food items).

E

equals(Object) - Method in class FoodItem
Returns true if this FoodItem represents the same food item as the other object, false otherwise.
equals(Object) - Method in class Item
Returns true if this item and the other object both represent the same item.

F

FoodItem - Class in <Unnamed>
A food item object is an Item object that has a name, a UPC code, and a shelf life.
FoodItem(String, String, int) - Constructor for class FoodItem
Builds a food item with the specified name, UPC code, and shelf life (in days).

G

getDate(I) - Method in class Inventory
This method returns the oldest expiration date for the specified item in the inventory.
getExpirationDate(GregorianCalendar) - Method in class FoodItem
Given the date the food item was received, this method will return the corresponding expiration date for this food item.
getItemsExpiredBeforeDate(GregorianCalendar) - Method in class Inventory
This method returns an ArrayList of items whose expiration date is before the specified date.
getName() - Method in class FoodItem
Returns the name code for this food item.
getName() - Method in class Item
Returns the name of this item as a String.
getQuantity(I, GregorianCalendar) - Method in class Inventory
This method returns the quantity of this item (with the specified expiration date) in the inventory.
getShelfLife() - Method in class FoodItem
Returns the shelf life code for this food item.
getUPC() - Method in class FoodItem
Returns the universal product code for this food item.
getUPC() - Method in class Item
Returns the upc of this item as a String.

H

hashCode() - Method in class FoodItem
Returns a hash code for this food item.
hashCode() - Method in class Item
Returns a hashCode that is guaranteed to be equal for items that are equal.

I

Inventory<I extends Item> - Class in <Unnamed>
This class represents an inventory of items that each have a quantity and an expiration date.
Inventory() - Constructor for class Inventory
Builds an empty inventory.
inventory - Variable in class Inventory
 
Item - Class in <Unnamed>
This class overrides the equals() and hashcode() methods so that it wil be properly handled by the various Collection classes.
Item(String, String) - Constructor for class Item
Constructs a general purpose item with the given universal product code.

R

Reads the end of transaction records.
readFoodItem(String) - Method in class TransactionReader
Reads and parses the food item record.
readNextDay(String) - Method in class TransactionReader
Reads and parses the next day record and advances the current day by one day.
readReceive(String) - Method in class TransactionReader
Reads and parses the receive food item record.
readRequest(String) - Method in class TransactionReader
Reads and parses the request food item record.
readStartDate(String) - Method in class TransactionReader
Reads and parses the start date record and creates a GergorianCalendar object representing the start date.
readWarehouse(String) - Method in class TransactionReader
Reads and parses the warehouse record.
removeItem(I, GregorianCalendar, int) - Method in class Inventory
Reduces the quantity of an item (specified by item object and date) in the inventory by the specified quantity.

T

This class parses the transaction file.
TransactionReader(File) - Constructor for class TransactionReader
